strengths: Spec stays scoped exactly to the PRD requirements without fluff
Explicitly reuses existing auth logs and infrastructure; no new services
Implementation plan is short (5 steps) and clearly shippable within a week
summary: Spec is lean, clear, and directly maps to the PRD. It keeps scope tight to the three required metrics, reuses existing data sources, avoids any new infrastructure, and lays out a straightforward plan with basic error handling and tests. No changes needed.
